game.name: Skywarden
game.categories: Single-player, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Explore floating islands in this voxel roguelike where you harvest Magnetite cores to power your Nexus. Build beacons to claim resource-rich islands or steal their cores for instant power. Catch falling stars, upgrade your abilities, and defend the Endless Sky as the Skywarden.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Explore floating islands in this voxel roguelike where you harvest Magnetite cores to power your Nexus. Build beacons to claim resource-rich islands or steal their cores for instant power. Catch falling stars, upgrade your abilities, and defend the Endless Sky as the Skywarden.
